chart.title: Forest area
chart.subtitle: Forest area is land under natural or planted stands of trees of at least 5 meters in situ, whether productive or not, and excludes tree stands in agricultural production systems.
chart.citation: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations

Forest area.citationShort: – processed by Our World in Data
Forest area.citationLong: – processed by Our World in Data. “Forest area” [dataset]. UN Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO). Forest Resources Assessment. [original data].
